A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The good\, Kyle Ren character has depth\, he and Rey have chemistry. BB8 provided comic relief. The bad\, Leia in space? Not enough Jedi action\, pathetic Jedi training\, Yoda was out of place & the ending was trash. I was stunned when the credits started\, I thought I missed something. This would’ve been a good offshoot movie. Worse then Phantom Menace
